name: The Lizard Basement
description: Abducted to a strange, underground location. Can you escape the Lizard Basement?

1.name: Awakening
1.description: You awake from a deep and uneasy slumber, lying on the ground in a square room surrounded by stone brick walls and slimy vines. On one side of the room are iron bars with something that looks like a door in the middle. You don't remember a thing from what happened last night, but you do know that you feel like you had one drink too much. Time to find a way out of here!

paths.name: Prison door
paths.description: The prison door, with a lock that appears to be opened with a key.

1.hint: There must be something in this room you can investigate.

1-override.name: Starting chamber
1-override.description: This is where you started. It is a simple square prison room with an opened door.

1-override-override.name: Starting chamber
1-override-override.description: The starting room, once again! Find the exit!

paths.name: Suspicious vine
paths.description: A vine hanging a bit lower than the others.

paths.name: Cracked floor brick
paths.description: One of the floor bricks has cracks on it and can probably be broken with some force.

paths.name: Mossy patch on the wall
paths.description: There is a mossy patch on the wall. Maybe a push will open up a way?

test-combat-room.name: Combat Room
test-combat-room.description: There's a combat is this room, so you'll only see this room after you resolved the combat

2.name: Hallway
2.description: A long hallway with a couple of closed prison cell doors and the (opened) one you started this adventure in. On the far side to the left you can see a stairway leading up to a closed wooden door with a window in it.

paths.name: The room you started in
paths.description: This is the room where your adventure started.

paths.name: Prison cell 1
paths.description: The door to the cell is open.

paths.name: Prison cell 2
paths.description: The door to the cell is open.

paths.name: Prison cell 3
paths.description: The door to the cell is open.

2.hint: There is an NPC in this room, but he won't show up without the proper preparations.

cell-door-1-code.name: Keypad
cell-door-1-code.description: A keypad showing numbers from 0 to 10.

paths.name: Enter cell door
paths.description: After entering the correct code, the lock beeps 3 times and you hear a clicking sound. The cell is now open to explore.

3.name: Prison cell 1
3.description: The prison cell looks recently inhabited with a mirror in the wall, some smelly food in the corner and a bedroll on the ground.

4.name: Prison cell 2
4.description: The prison cell is empty except for the Lizard that has been dealt with.

5.name: Prison cell 3
5.description: This prison cell looks way off compared to the others. It has some high-tech equipment in there and it looks like it might control some electronic devices in the rest of the building. There are also some screens in the room that currently only display static. There is a large control pad in the middle of the room that looks very complicated to use.

control-panel-left.name: Left control panel
control-panel-left.description: The panel has a numberpanel on it. It looks like it's asking for a code.

paths.name: Stop looking at left control panel
paths.description: After entering the correct code, the panel turns to a low humming noise.

paths.name: Stop looking at left control panel
paths.description: You can't figure out the right code. Let's get back to it later.

control-panel-middle.name: Middle control panel
control-panel-middle.description: The panel has 4 buttons with colors on it. Which button will you press?

paths.name: Stop looking at middle control panel
paths.description: After entering the correct code, the panel turns to a low humming noise.

paths.name: Stop looking at middle control panel
paths.description: You can't figure out the right code. Let's get back to it later.

control-panel-right.name: Right control panel
control-panel-right.description: The panel looks way too complicated to handle. What will you do with it?

paths.name: Stop looking at right control panel
paths.description: After smashing the machine with your bare hands, the panel stops working and shuts down.

paths.name: Stop looking at right control panel
paths.description: You can't figure out what to do. Let's get back to it later.

paths.name: Smash the entire thing.
paths.description: You smash the entire thing with your bare hands. Uncontrollable rage at being held captive takes over and you feel a lot better after the fact.

mission-fail.name: Oh no, you failed to escape!
mission-fail.description: After entering the wrong solution to a puzzle you have been caught redhanded trying to escape your predicament. For the rest of your life you will be forced to drink cold schultenbrau without being able to throw it off the table before being able to drink it. Oh the misery!

mission-end.name: This is the end of the demo
mission-end.description: This is as far as you can get with the current demo. If you like this story so far be sure to let us know. If there is anything missing or not working correctly, please be sure not to let us know.

cell-door-0-key.name: Prison door key
cell-door-0-key.description: This key looks like it might open the prison cell door.

puzzle-cell-door-1.name: Suspicious parchment
puzzle-cell-door-1.description: The parchment you found in the hallway of the prison. There is somekind of puzzle on the back.

mirror-shard.name: Mirror shard
mirror-shard.description: A sharp shard of a mirror, obtained through a rather rash decision.

smelly-cheese.name: Smelly cheese
smelly-cheese.description: An old and stinky cheese. Why did you pick this up again?

door-2-key.name: Lizard head key
door-2-key.description: A golden key. You wonder what it can be used for.

key-card-cell-3.name: Key card
key-card-cell-3.description: A plastic key card with a black strip on the side. Looks like it should be used on a card reader of some sort.

dirty-note.name: Dirty note
dirty-note.description: It looks like a note written to someone that used to operate this machinery.

chalk-board-image.name: Chalkboard
chalk-board-image.description: The mental image you took of the chalkboard.

story-explanation.name: Piece of paper in the hallway
story-explanation.description: A piece of parchment lying on the ground. I wonder what's on it?

options.response: Looks like you're awake. Guess the sleeping pills I slipped in your drinks last night were a little too strong, hehehe.. It doesn't matter though. All you need to know is that you have been seen mutilating Schultenbrau beer on multiple occasions. My boss doesn't appreciate that, you see. That's why you are here - to repent. If you do, you can leave with your lives. If you do not, you will perish in my dungeon. And remember: everything is going to be VINE! Hahahahaha...
It looks like a puzzle.

story-explanation.hint: This piece of parchment gives backstory to the situation.

tour-guide.name: Tour Guide
tour-guide.description: This guy seems he might know the way around town, and the maze

options.response: Mkay.

tour-guide.hint: This NPC can give the party an item or make it rain in the maze. This is required for something I don't really know this story very well.

loose-brick.name: Loose brick
loose-brick.description: A brick hangs out from the wall.

options.response: It looks like there's something behind it.
The brick falls on the ground, revealing a key in the crevice left behind.
You pick up a key from behind the brick.

loose-brick.hint: This Thing can be touched, it doesn't really like it though.

prison-cell-0-door.name: Cell 0 door
prison-cell-0-door.description: The door looks slightly rickety and it has a lock on it.

options.response: The lock is locked, in fine condition and requires a key. Maybe the key is somewhere around?
You try the key on the door and the door unlocks.

prison-cell-1.name: Prison cell 1
prison-cell-1.description: The first prison cell in the hallway. It is located directly in front of the cell you came from. The door is closed and seems locked with a numberlock.

options.response: The lock is locked, in fine condition and requires a number combination.

prison-cell-1.hint: Maybe the parchment in your inventory contains a clue for the combination?

prison-cell-2.name: Prison cell 2
prison-cell-2.description: The second prison cell is located to the right of the first prison cell. The door is closed.

options.response: The room is empty but there is a small creature in the corner of the room. It is lying down on a piece of plastic which looks like something you might want.
The door is locked with a weird-looking lock.
You try the key on the door and the door unlocks.

prison-cell-3.name: Prison cell 3
prison-cell-3.description: The third prison cell is sealed off with an electrical door. It looks way more fancy and secure than the other prison cells. It is impossible to look into it.

options.response: There is a slider located on the door. It looks like it would require a key-card of some sort to open the door.
You try the key on the slider and the door zooms open.

prison-exit.name: Wooden door with window
prison-exit.description: This door seems to lead upward, out of the prison.

options.response: Peeking through the window you see a dimly lit room with a sleeping guard to the right. Next to him is a key, probably used to open the door in front of you - best not to disturb him for now. On the left you see a hallway leading away from the room. The rest of the room looks very plain and uninteresting.
You smash the mirror with your fist. Ouch, that hurts! Why would you do that? You take a shard of the mirror with you.

smelly-food-1.name: Smelly food
smelly-food-1.description: A plate with some leftovers. The flies are attracted to it.

options.response: Yuck, the food smells terrible. You find a piece of cheese that looks better than it smells.

bedroll-1.name: Bedroll
bedroll-1.description: A bedroll that looks like no one hasn't slept in it for a while.

options.response: You find a golden key with a lizard-shaped head at the base. What would you need it for, and why would someone make a key shaped like a lizard?

dirty-note.name: A dirty note
dirty-note.description: You see a note sticking out from the control panel's side.

options.response: You obtain the note. Check your pockets!

control-panel.name: The control panel
control-panel.description: The panel that seems to control every piece of electricity in this room. Maybe you can use it to get the screens to work properly?

options.response: The panel consists of 3 parts. The leftmost part is a number panel, the middle part consists of 9 differently colored buttons and the right part looks like it came from a sci-fi movie with all kinds of beeping lights, flashing numbers and important looking diodes.

The screens stop showin static and suddenly show vivid images of the things apparently going on in the dungeon. One screen shows an interrogation chamber with another mutant lizard dressed up as a torturer having his way with a poor prisoner. Another screen shows a big pot of Schultenbrau being produced by the monstrous lizardmen, a third screen shows the hallway that is behind the wooden door of the prison (including the sleeping guard) while a fourth screen shows an empty cell which you recognize as the one you woke up in. You are obviously being actively monitored throughout the whole ordeal.. but why? And what the hell is happening in this place? You only know one thing: you want to get out, and make sure that what happened to you will not happen to anyone again.

chalk-board.name: A chalk board
chalk-board.description: You are looking at a chalk board that has a lot of scribbling on it. You can make out that there are probably two topics described on the board.

options.response: You make a mental image and store it in your (mental) inventory.

game-win.name: You won!
game-win.description: You have reached the ending, congrats!
game-win.message: The game is now over, you can reload the page.

brick-pulled.name: You pull the brick out of the wall.

cell-code-step-4.name: Step 4
cell-code-step-4.message: The lock appears to be unlocked.

cell-door-2-examined.name: Cell door 2 examined
cell-door-2-examined.message: The lock is unlike you have ever seen, the shape is very unique. It looks somewhat like a reptile...

cell-door-2-open.name: Cell door 2 opened
cell-door-2-open.message: The lock clicks open and you can enter the cell freely now.

resolved-combat-lethal.name: The fight is resolved in violence.
resolved-combat-lethal.message: After a short struggle you overpower the lizard with your superior height and intelligence. The lizard now lies dead in a pool of its own blood, the mirror shard still in your hands, shakingly.

resolved-combat-peaceful.name: The lizard is easily distracted.
resolved-combat-peaceful.message: After showing the food, the lizard almost instantly starts to behave like a canine pup and gleefully zigzags in front of you. The lizard looks trained, probably given cheese when certain tasks were performed. You throw the cheese toward the other corner of the room and the lizard dashes over there and starts playing with its food.

cell-door-3-examined.name: Cell door 3 examined
cell-door-3-examined.message: The door looks unbreakable and has a slider for a key-card on it.

cell-door-3-open.name: Cell door 3 opened
cell-door-3-open.message: The door zooms open with a mechanical sound.

left-panel-step-2.name: Step 2
left-panel-step-2.message: You enter the correct code. The panel starts humming lowly and seems to be actively working.

middle-panel.name: Middle panel button pressed
middle-panel.description: You press the correct button. The panel starts humming lowly and seems to be actively working.

right-panel-smashed.name: Right panel smashed
right-panel-smashed.description: You smash the right p,anel completely and utterly.

plot-revealed.name: Everything makes sense now.
plot-revealed.description: You know where to go, and what to do.

lizard-1.title: A mutated lizard
lizard-1.description: A large, overgrown lizard cautiously watches you enter the room. It growls and hisses as you get closer. It's obvious the monstrosity is not planning on sharing its enclosure with others.
lizard-1.hint: Maybe you can distract the lizard with something?

options.response: You take the shard of the broken mirror from your pocket and charge the monster with the sharp end.
You remember the piece of cheese in your pocket. You try to lure the lizard away with it, better hope it's hungry!
After killing the lizard, you are free to obtain the loot it was guarding.
With the lizard happily distracted, you are free to grab the loot it was guarding.

characters.name: Arnoud Krabbius
characters.title: The Barbarian
characters.description: Arnoud is a big, muscular half-orc. He loves fighting, using his gigantic two handed broad axe. Although he is an impressive combatant, he is easily tricked when facing witty enemies.
characters.backstory: Arnoud grew up in Arnhem, where 'Messentrekken' was a common move on the streets. This way he learned to always be ready for a fight.

characters.name: Joey Feed'r
characters.title: Longshot Lackey
characters.description: He can throw a frikadel like no other.
characters.backstory: Joey has always enjoyed food, and prefers to have breakfast that isn't particulary healthy. This passion for food gave him exceptional abilities when preparing future meals. He can throw any fast food with great power and accuracy.

characters.name: Spincent
characters.title: The Scary Spider
characters.backstory: After an unfortunate event Spincent grew extra legs, at first this seemed like a disadvantage, but soon he evolved. This turned him into a spider who has the size and strength of a human.
